answers.answer: I forgot to add the date, lol. she was born at 6:58 am on April 20th. I was in active labor for only about an hour or so.
Congrats on the easy delivery! i cant wait to see pics of your little princess! enjoy her :)

http://www.medhelp.org/user_photos/show/136229?personal_page_id=267892don't know if this link will work, but i don't know how else to link into my pic! if you cant see it it's on my profile page. i love that little dress

question: Ariella Rose is here! 8 lb. 14 ounces 21 inches.I went in to be induced from preeclampsia and ended up going into labor on my own while i was waiting for a bed! thankfully I made it to a bed in time and she came so quickly the doc never made it to the room. A nurse delivered her. I only pushed once. litterally, the nurse came in to see why I was screaming, went to check my cervix- at her touch my water bag exploded all over her- and maybe 10 to 15 seconds later she was out. talk about fast. I was in shock. it was like the kid just fell out of me. even though this was my third baby, I just couldn't believe what was happening to me. I'm glad its over though! she's a princess.
title: Finally! Ariella Rose is here!
